previewArticle.title: Portland Timbers vs. LA Galaxy | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Portland Timbers 1, LA Galaxy 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A pair of clubs looking to make a move up the Western Conference table meet in the weekend’s marquee matchup, when the Portland Timbers play host to the LA Galaxy on Sunday at Providence Park before an NBC Sports Network audience.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Portland Timbers vs. LA Galaxy

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: PDX starting to turn the screws on LA. They're finding space along the flanks with Zakuani taking on Gargan,but two corners earn nothing.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jack Jewsbury (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Diego Valeri with a cross following a corner.
Attempt missed. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Robbie Keane.
Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Diego Chara (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Donovan playing at the top of the diamond while Ishizaki plays to his right side. LA trying to get numbers centrally. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Pa Modou Kah.

timelineItems.name: Leftie Quixote
timelineItems.text: Landon getting lots of touches in this game so far. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Portland aren't giving the #LAGalaxy any room to breath with their frequent press which is forcing LA to move the ball around. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 17' - Quick FK from Valeri to Nagbe in left corner. He cuts to goal and passes to middle but LA pokes away from danger. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Steve Zakuani (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Green and gold, green and gold, green and gold, gold, gold. #RCTID https://t.co/sP8vrAgxHv

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Will Johnson.
Hand ball by Mamadou Danso (Portland Timbers).
Hand ball by Michael Harrington (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Stefan Ishizaki cracks a shot wide

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Keane earns a free kick just off to the right of the penalty area after a hand ball by Harrington.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Juninho can't bang in the early free kick

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by A.J. DeLaGarza.

timelineItems.name: Chris O'Connor
timelineItems.text: Timbers Fact Of The Day: Caleb Porter isn't chewing gum. He is just grinding his teeth. Pure rage-grind. #rctid #ptfc

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 20' Ishizaki takes a corner that nearly floats into Ricketts' net. Portland runs right back up and earns a corner of their own. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Portland Timbers 1, LA Galaxy 1.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Full time! Timbers and Galaxy fight to exciting 1-1 draw with pair of offsetting late goals. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Lets Go Galaxy
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy deserved better today. The Portland Timbers were/ are complete garbage.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: These 2 or 3 minutes are why the Timbers are so frustrating/won't win a trophy anytime soon. Just gifting points. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Yikes, that was not pretty from Penedo. And now I'd really like to see a replay of Juninho's breakaway - looked like a foul and red. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Edgar Acero
timelineItems.text: Great reaction from the Timbers after one of the worst defensive moments I've seen in many years. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: This may be the first time Timber Joey has cut a log in a national TV game without a camera on him. #Keanegasm #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Lets Go Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Referee was a wuss at the end. If you can't make the tough call go into a different profession. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Move over scarves, @timberjoey needs to cut a slab for Diego Valeri. Timbers find equalizer in… http://t.co/qhzraF7V7j

timelineItems.desc: Two teams tied in the middle of the West standings meet up in this weekend’s marquee matchup as the Portland Timbers play host to the LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Portland Timbers vs. LA Galaxy | May 11, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Roaring finish in the Rose City. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/A7cS3cLBHj #PORvLA http://t.co/HSdGqX4bv2

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Roaring finish in the Rose City. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/A7cS3cLBHj #PORvLA http://t.co/HSdGqX4bv2

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Not one, but two stoppage-time goals in a drama-filled #PORvLA. Watch 'em both: http://t.co/xG9nXmSj2N

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Rob Friend.

timelineItems.name: Fake JP Dellacamera
timelineItems.text: That's quite an aerobics class Timbers Army has going on there. #PORvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Stefan Ishizaki whips a shot wide from distance

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Rob Friend with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 23' - Off a header, LA's Ishizaki tries to volley it from 35 yards out and ball flies well wide right. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: CLOSE from Ishizaki That was an audacious attempt and the Swede almost caught Ricketts unaware from 30 yards. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Jack Jewsbury (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy).
Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Pa Modou Kah (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki with a bold take there on the volley. Attempts like that are nice, but LA need to use their possession advantage. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki has been working his butt off. Need more possession from #lagalaxy midfield.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 25' - Powell with a great toe in to poke ball away from Keane. Starts promising counter for POR. Valeri's cross into box gathered by Penedo.

timelineItems.name: Peter Murphy
timelineItems.text: #PORvLA w/o Omar I expect a lot more direct attacking from #LA & diamond mid-field. But #PDX dictating pace despite @LAGalaxy possession.

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #PORvLA There is NO WAY these teams keep up this pace in the second half!

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: A collective sigh of relief from the #LAGalaxy after Penedo comes out to collect a ball deflected off Gargan. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Pa Modou Kah.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 27' - Kah with perfectly time tackle on LA's Friend in the box to knock ball away. Corner for LA. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: There has been some very suspect defending from both teams so far. I am expecting a few goals in this one. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 28' Ishizaki getting chances on the corner, but his attempts have been less than helpful so far. No lift.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Rob Friend snaps a shot over Ricketts fingertips

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: JUST OVER THE BAR! Rob Friend fires a shot that sails just over Ricketts. LA argue he touched it, but a goal kick is awarded. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Just high from Rob Friend! The towering Canadian almost put Portland in the Friend Zone from 25 yards. Still scoreless in PDX. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Juninho.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 3' - LA with a FK near the corner. Pings around in the mixer but Ricketts calmly collects. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Nothing on the free kick as the ball falls to Juninho but Portland is able to clear out the danger.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Attempt blocked. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Rob Friend from about 30 yards out? Yes he can and almost did. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: Set pieces totally inert though. Maybe that's just not a thing we score on anymore. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: 27' beautiful strike from Rob Friend! Perhaps he'll get on the stat sheet today #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Rob Friend (LA Galaxy).
Donovan Ricketts (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: If Landon doesn't score today, he's going into #USMNT camp with 0 goals scored in 630 league minutes played this year. #Landon135 #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 31' - Fernandez chips up to speedy Zakuani. Zakuani's cross into box stopped. Fernandez recovers to dribble in but stopped. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Pa Modou Kah (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Kah avoids red...and yellow...despite clearly kicking Keane. Villarreal issues only a warning to the Portland defender. Wow. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers).
A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Kah stomped on Keane. Should've been a card. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #PORvLA For two clubs who were league leaders in scoring off set pieces previous years, they have been absolutely inept this year.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 34' - Valeri picks Leonardo's pocket and goes in on goal. LA scramble back and muck up the ball. Also, Fernandez earns a yellow. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 35'  Opare surrenders possession to Valeri, but he's quick on the take to clear away the danger. Next sequence sees Fernandez earn yellow.

timelineItems.name: Ernesto X Aguilar
timelineItems.text: So far that's 4 straight up turnovers and only 2 completed passes by our man #zakuani #ptfc

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Portland’s Gaston “La Gata” Fernandez is issued a yellow card for bringing down AJ DLG from behind, which is not allowed in soccer. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Mamadou Danso.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Gaston Fernandez (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE:  Darlington Nagbe whiffs on the chance in the box

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Wow. The Ishizaki corner falls perfectly to Donovan, but he's twisted around and is forced to pass despite being near on goal. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Brandon Lemons
timelineItems.text: LD with a gift and he can't capitalize. �. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: terrific 1st half performance by #LAGalaxy so far, should be up 2-0, controlling possession which was #Timbers trademark last year #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy).
Mamadou Danso (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: What an amazing setting for a game of soccer. #PORvLA http://t.co/FA4DDe8pG8

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: What an amazing setting for a game of soccer. #PORvLA http://t.co/FA4DDe8pG8

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Futty Danso and Robbie Keane jawing throughout play. Safe to say Keane is gunning for him. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 39' - FANTASTIC steal by Chara on Donovan at the top of the 18. Donovan still doesn't know where ball went. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: That touch by Keane....holy smokes. #PORvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Ricketts get down to stop Keane

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 3' OVER THE BAR. Mighty active start from the #LAGalaxy as Donovan sets up Ishizaki who blasts it over net.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Michael Harrington (Portland Timbers) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Taylor Twellman
timelineItems.text: Kah just kicked me through my TV. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: SAVE RICKETTS! Great build-up play by the #LAGalaxy results in Donovan laying off the ball for Keane who forces a save. #PORvLA

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Western Conference clash between the Portland Timbers and LA Galaxy. Can Portland extend their unbeaten streak vs. LA to 4 games? Does Mamadou Danso have what it takes to neutralize Robbie Keane? Find out Sunday at 230pm ET on NBCSN.
timelineItems.title: Portland Timbers vs. LA Galaxy May 11, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: 40' As expected, our best attempt yet comes from Robbie Keane #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: That was some beautiful football from the @lagalaxy on the break. Keane got stopped, but it was close. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 1 - After conceding 9 goals to LA in 3 games in @MLS 2012, @TimbersFC conceded just 1 in 3 games in 2013. Marked. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 42: Shot on target for #LAGalaxy. The visitors are looking for a way to unlock the opposition defence and start the scoring in this first ha

timelineItems.comment: Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).
Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Dan Gargan.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 43' - Nice touch by Jewsbury in left corner to burn Gargan. Defender recovers and knocks free for corner. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Danny H
timelineItems.text: Looks like a great atmosphere at #portlandtimbers v #LAGalaxy game.Football has grown rapidly in the States over last few years #soccer #USA

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #PORvLA Arena and Porter will be giving out air instead of water in the locker room at the half.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Dan Gargan.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Baggio Husidic bangs a left-footer high and wide

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Portland earn their seventh corner of the half but it is cleared by #LAGalaxy. There's been 11 in total so far in the first half of #PORvLA.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Gargan has been so busy this game. He's been solid going both ways. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: There will be one minute of added time. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: HT - 0-0. The #LAGalaxy earning plenty of possession, but few great chances so far against the Timbers. Back and forth half. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: I'm not enjoying watching Zakuani look like a slower, less explosive shell of his former self. :-\ #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Portland Timbers 0, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Am I the only one who's mentally prepared for a choppy, no-flow, foul filled second half? #90MinsOfRunningInFirstHalf #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Jarosi Sports Law
timelineItems.text: Per Arena, the sticky nature of the artificial turf creating a sub-standard soccer game. #MLS #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: But @lagalaxy needs to find some success through the middle on the ground in the final third. Crosses aren't finding the target. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Not yet but they've played "Stacy's Mom." MT @ryanberdan: question: can you tell me if they play Pitbull ft. Ke$ha at Providence Park?

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Watch how close Stefan Ishizaki came to opening the scoring against the Timbers in the first half: http://t.co/9F7M2zTwWi #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Portland Timbers 0, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Were back for the second stanza in Portland. Turn on @NBCSN to see if the #LAGalaxy can grab three points. #PORvLA http://t.co/qOQEvdnjGy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Were back for the second stanza in Portland. Turn on @NBCSN to see if the #LAGalaxy can grab three points. #PORvLA http://t.co/qOQEvdnjGy

timelineItems.comment: Mamadou Danso (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Ricketts makes a crucial stop on Keane, keeps sheet clean. http://t.co/d9kQ5SOCTH #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Portland Timbers. Diego Chara tries a through ball, but Steve Zakuani is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Juninho is literally everywhere right now. Breaking up plays all over the field. His work rate has been fantastic. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Back underway. #PORvLA http://t.co/z4tHyKENft

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Back underway. #PORvLA http://t.co/z4tHyKENft

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: This game is going to whomever scores first. It's anyone's game. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diego Chara (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 5' - Harrington down for a moment. Trainers checking on him. Looks like a sub coming in. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Dan Itel
timelineItems.text: Harrington down and it's not looking good. Sat out earlier this week with ankle injury. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 49' - Great vision from Nagbe as he threads a ball to sprinting Powell into the box. LA defense recovers though. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: AJ has been laboring. His gait doesn't look smooth. I'm worried about him. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: BLOCK: Landon Donovan has his attempt poked away

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dan Gargan with a cross.

Foul by Alvas Powell (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Fake JP Dellacamera
timelineItems.text: Everything about the Timbers atmosphere is amazing. It's too bad the field makes play look like a foosball game. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 52' - Block and a block. Ricketts punches out low on a LA FK and then POR blocks ensuing rebound shot. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jack Jewsbury.
Attempt saved. Darlington Nagbe (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Gastón Fernández.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: SAVE(S) PENEDO! The Panamanian with two huge stops to keep this one level! #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 53' - Back-to-back shots on goal! Valeri fires from edge of 18, Panedo saves. Nagbe gathers rebound, fires. Panedo saves. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: TWO BIG SAVES BY PENEDO! #ElGeneral denies Valeri and then a chance by Nagbe. Clutch stops by the 'keeper. #PORvLA

timelineItems.text: Being awesome? "@LAGalaxy: What in the world do you think these two are talking about? #PORvLA http://t.co/ztoHpxBwRa"

timelineItems.text: Let's do this. #PORvLA

timelineItems.text: What a glorious day in Bridgetown for some soccer. #Landon135 #PORvLA http://t.co/NaMmCG0bKO

timelineItems.text: not sure I've seen Keane play a worse cross than that left-footer - capped a pretty exciting few minutes of end-to-end action #PORvLA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Watching Friend lose his mind at Keane a bit after a terrible cross. That tickled me. #PORvLA

timelineItems.text: Getting set for a good day of #MLS action today, starting with #PORvLA on NBCSN. Let's do this.

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Really awkward pregame moment when @OriginalWinger told me I have a Mango Tango mustache. #ywc #PRprofesh #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: The Chairman Jeff
timelineItems.text: Big, big game for @TimbersFC today. I like our chances against the #ColumbusCrew, so a win against the #LAGalaxy will be huge.

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: . @landondonovan scores No. 135 today. Book it. #mls #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Have a feeling Landon gets the goal today. #PORvLA (Go ahead and favorite this so you can make fun of us later.)

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Juninho goes down in around the penalty area, but Villarreal waves play on. Looked a bit close on the telecast. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 56' - Ball out for throw. Behind the play, Chara is down with trainers attending to him.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Diego Chara (Portland Timbers) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Will @MLS history be made in Portland? #Landon135 #PORvLA http://t.co/QxeTVLcCVX

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Will @MLS history be made in Portland? #Landon135 #PORvLA http://t.co/QxeTVLcCVX

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: "Brian's corner" not to be confused with "Kyle's corner".Anyone else with corners they need to discuss? #PORvLA @OriginalWinger @kylemartino

timelineItems.text: .@OriginalWinger and @RussThaler wrapping up the pre-game show for @NBCSN. #PORvLA #RCTID http://t.co/ct6bJqwE6a

timelineItems.text: Watching #PORvLA on @NBCSN? We recently spoke to @LAGalaxy defender @HeyDanGargan: http://t.co/nIQ8Zsk0IM http://t.co/QXB9XST2uJ

timelineItems.text: Watching #PORvLA on @NBCSN? We recently spoke to @LAGalaxy defender @HeyDanGargan: http://t.co/nIQ8Zsk0IM http://t.co/QXB9XST2uJ

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: That first touch from Keane though. #PORvLA https://t.co/YiVCJXNgCC

timelineItems.name: Ross Smith
timelineItems.text: Great to see @StrongMLS and his obvious excitement as the teams are coming out #PORvLA #RCTID http://t.co/B89wqg7PE7

timelineItems.text: Great to see @StrongMLS and his obvious excitement as the teams are coming out #PORvLA #RCTID http://t.co/B89wqg7PE7

timelineItems.name: Paul Danzer
timelineItems.text: Timbers Army awake and tuned up for #PORvLA. #RCTID http://t.co/e9RQyF044C

timelineItems.name: Paul Danzer
timelineItems.text: Timbers Army awake and tuned up for #PORvLA. #RCTID http://t.co/e9RQyF044C

timelineItems.desc: Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Dan Gargan knees down Zakuani

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Stirring national anthem on this gorgeous day for football. #PORvLA kicks off in minutes on @NBCSN. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: Fun fact about the PTFC chant. Unlike Seattle and Vancouver who added FC, there is no FC in Portland's official club name. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Will and the boys are ready to go, are you? #RCTID http://t.co/9PTqlVrSB6

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Warm-ups over. It's game time. P-T-F-C! #PORvLA #RCTID

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: This is going to be a doozy. Flip over to @NBCSN NOW! #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Timbers and Galaxy are underway at Providence Park! Watch on @NBCSN! #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.desc: Portland has a good chance on a free kick, but Futty Danso's header bangs off post.
timelineItems.title: POST: Futty Danso lines a header off the far post

timelineItems.comment: Steve Zakuani (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Chara is up and walking to the sidelines. Looks like he'll wait to get waved back in. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: I don't know how happy Nike is going to be that they're shoes are getting cut up on the field #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Mamadou Danso (Portland Timbers) hits the right post with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Diego Valeri with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 58' Dan Gargan picks up a yellow for tripping Zakuani.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Chara gets his hand wrapped and comes back in to applause

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 6' Powell coming into the came after Harrington goes down with an injury. Not what Caleb Porter wanted to do just minutes in to #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Francisco X. Rivera
timelineItems.text: @LAGalaxy haven't won away in a US stadium (not counting Chivas USA) since May 15th, 2013 (4-1 vs Union) #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The Timbers have to go to their bench early. Alvas Powell will replace the injured Michael Harrington. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 59' - POST! Danso knocks from back of his head a FK ball that pings off inside of far post! #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: SAVE BY THE POST! Danso gets loose and a glancing header goes off the woodwork. Portland with a corner.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Valeri free kick finds Futty who's header flicks off the back post and out. So close for Portland. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Kayla Knapp
timelineItems.text: I have absolutely no idea how that didn't go in. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Arthur Ueck
timelineItems.text: Leonardo lost another player... I swear we will never sell because he's so damn terrible. #LAGalaxy #Issues

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: How. Did. That. Not. Go. In. Leonardo decided to stop marking players. It's hot guys. You know? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: How long until we just take the "O" of Leonardo's name and call him Leonard? One more screw up? Two? #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Still searching… #Landon135 #PORvLA http://t.co/DijTLPMsq4

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Still searching… #Landon135 #PORvLA http://t.co/DijTLPMsq4

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki's crosses and corners not really finding anybody today. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mamadou Danso (Portland Timbers).
Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Listen to @OriginalWinger on Juninho. He speaks the truth. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Juninho takes a shot from distance

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dan Gargan.
Attempt saved. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dan Gargan.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Thank you for the fantastic support away from home @LARiotSquad, @ACBrigade & @Galaxians. (Pic via @MattW72) #PORvLA http://t.co/CRASYh3qu1

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Thank you for the fantastic support away from home @LARiotSquad, @ACBrigade & @Galaxians. (Pic via @MattW72) #PORvLA http://t.co/CRASYh3qu1

timelineItems.comment: A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Alvas Powell (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: I can't handle this game. Just in a ball in the corner, quietly humming. 55% possession and no goals. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Diego Chara (Portland Timbers) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 67' - Trainer out to check on Chara again. Looks like we'll have a sub coming in in a moment. #RCTID

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Will Johnson (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Will Johnson skips one from distance

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 68' - Big applause for the Colombian Chara as he comes out for Ben Zemanski. Score is 0-0. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Portland makes another substitution as Ben Zemanski comes on for Chara who can not continue. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt saved. Will Johnson (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Darlington Nagbe.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 68' - Johnson tees up a shot from 35 yards out. Panedo catches it on a bounce. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Darlington Nagbe (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Watered prior to kick off. RT @cboehm Hey #RCTID folks, do PTFC water the Providence Park turf on days like this?

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 7' - LA works the left channel with Powell tracking. Play in a cross from sharp angle but Ricketts snatches away. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Samuel about to come into the match. I'd assume for Rob Friend.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 70' - After great string of passes, it looked like Nagbe unlocked back line for Zakuani. Zakuani goes sprawling on the pass but no call.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Stefan Ishizaki pulls one wide

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy).
Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Samuel comes into the match for Rob Friend. Moments after Ishizaki sprays a shot wide. #PORvLA.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: I've seen us practice shooting on goal in training. But that doesn't seem to be translating right now. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Bruce Arena goes to the bench: Friend off. Samuel on. Can the Brazilian bag the winner? #PORvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Baggio Husidic pokes a sliding shot wide

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Samuel Rosa.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Alvas Powell.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 74' - Powell with a last man block on a Husidic shot from the back post. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 74' CORNER Galaxy. Great cross from the flank, but Baggio Husidic's attempt is cleared. Close from LA.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Juninho chips a shot wide

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Pa Modou Kah.
Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Juninho has come off limping on the corner. Looks like he'll be fine as LA earn yet their sixth corner of the afternoon. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Greg Lalas
timelineItems.text: It hasn't led to anything for @LAGalaxy, but @landondonovan has been very sharp & quick today. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Baggio looks gassed. Ishizaki gassed. Don't sub either of them. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Leonardo and Kofi Opare looking very solid together against Portland today. They'll face a new challenge in the quick Urruti though.#PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Alvas Powell (Portland Timbers).
A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay in match A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 79' - Foul in LA side of field. Galaxy tried quick start but De La Garza was injured on foul. Trainers check on him and he's up.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Donovan Ricketts stuffs a dangerous attempt from Donovan

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: DeLaGarza goes down after he takes a Zemanski hip in the face. He's going to walk off under his own power. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Donovan Ricketts splendid poke away on Keane

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.name: Mike Firpo
timelineItems.text: Donovan doing well all over the field for LA today. Looks up for Brazil. #PORvLA #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 81' - SAVE! Donovan with ball in arc, takes touch and fires but Ricketts denies him with a diving stop. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 82' - ANOTHER SAVE! This time Ricketts acrobatically denies Keane's curler! #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Jeff Kleiman
timelineItems.text: Merritt Paulsen will be hosting another Woodstock at Providence Park during the World Cup break for some extra revenue. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Donovan Ricketts.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: What a goal that would have been! Keane almost catches Ricketts off his line. That would’ve been something. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: @TimbersFC hit the post for the #MLS-leading 9th time (c/o @OptaJack): http://t.co/wcvfug80vP #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Gyasi Zardes about to come on for Husidic who had a tough game for the Galaxy.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Arena making moves: Zardes comes in for Husidic. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Ben Zemanski (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Zardes finally does what we want and no @LAGalaxy players on the end of it? You've got to be kidding me. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Alvas Powell (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy).
Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Juninho.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 87' - Kah again with an expertly timed tackle. This time on Rosa and ball goes out for goal kick. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Darlington Nagbe.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 88' - Valeri & Nagbe with give and go in the box. Valeri's shot blocked away for corner. Crowd on their feet. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Watch Penedo make it look easy with these two saves: http://t.co/5kCOY5dOgk

timelineItems.comment: Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ben Zemanski (Portland Timbers).
Attempt blocked. Samuel Rosa (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dan Gargan with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Armando Villarreal having a bit of a shocker... Samuel had a decent penalty shout there, but he waves it off. PDX earn a corner.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Kah doesn't get the ball. But I have no problem with the call. Samuel's touch too far. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: That should have been a PK against Kah. He did not get the ball but did get Samuel. #PORvLA #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Steve Zakuani (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Alvas Powell.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 88' - Jewsbury with pitch perfect defending on Rosa in the box. Pokes ball away to safety. #RCTID

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Jack Jewsbury (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE:  Jack Jewsbury pushes the corner wide

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 9' - Great combo play off the throw-in. Zakuani through to Jewsbury. His cross into top of six is poked just away from Nagbe. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Rob Friend.
Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by A.J. DeLaGarza.

timelineItems.name: Derek Walker
timelineItems.text: #MLS needs to get away from the artificial turf. I swear I see more awkward turf-related injuries in #MLS than any other pro league. #PTFC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: #Landon135 today, before the World Cup, please. #PORvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: There will be five minutes of added time in the second half. It is 0-0. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: We’re going to have a minimum of five minutes of stoppage time in Portland. Can LA find a winner? #PORvLA http://t.co/Lj9EATs6gm

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Here to make some noise. #RCTID http://t.co/HTc3D150gz

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Can't spell "close call" without Kah, or something. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: We’re going to have a minimum of five minutes of stoppage time in Portland. Can LA find a winner? #PORvLA http://t.co/Lj9EATs6gm

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Pa Modou Kah.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Portland Timbers 0, LA Galaxy 1. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) header from very close range to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Robbie Keane bounces a header by Ricketts

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: LA earn a corner that goes nowhere, but there will be five minutes of added time. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAL ROBBIE KEANE!!! #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: ROBBIE KEANE GOAL MACHINE! @LAGALAXY GOAL!

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Donovan Ricketts has plenty of reasons to be annoyed after that goal. Great Wall of Gambia far from great there. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan with the throw-in that takes a bounce for Keane who heads it past Ricketts. No cartwheels just joy from the @LAGalaxy captain.

timelineItems.name: Troy Beck
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane off of the throw on former Galaxy Goaltender, Donovan Ricketts in extra time. #LAGalaxy #Timbers

timelineItems.name: Lets Go Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie freaking Keane and nice throw in by Gargan. Let's get 3 pts here #LAGalaxy #Finish

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Gyasi Zardes.

timelineItems.name: Fake JP Dellacamera
timelineItems.text: Pretty easy to ball watch when the ball bounces right in front of you - can really get a good look at it. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Matt
timelineItems.text: Nagbe absolutely murdered him on that breakaway. If there was ever a case for DOGSO, that was it. Wow. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: It might be time for the Timbers to re-reconsider the Great Wall of Gambia. #PORvLA

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Portland Timbers 1, LA Galaxy 1. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Diego Valeri equalizes in extra time

timelineItems.name: cmsinser
timelineItems.text: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA #PORvLA #Keane #Schadenfreude http://t.co/vj0yLIrgqK

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 90+5' - GOALLLLLLLL!!!!! Valeri with the LATE equalizer!!!! It's all tied up 1-1!!!!! #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Benjamin Winters
timelineItems.text: Wow. 90 minutes of crap, 5 minutes of intrigue. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: GOAL PORTLAND! Frightful defending from the #LAGalaxy there. Valeri takes advantage and slots it past Penedo. 1-1.

timelineItems.name: cmsinser
timelineItems.text: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA #PORvLA #Keane #Schadenfreude http://t.co/vj0yLIrgqK

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Goal Portland. Diego Valeri answers back and equalizes for the Timbers. 1-1. #PORvLA

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Goal came via hard gritty work in the box by Danso & Johnson who would not quit on the ball. Valeri fired from sharp angle & it trickles in.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Valeri gets space and his shot is just under the arm of Penedo in the 95th minute. 1-1. #PORvLA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Portland Timbers 1, LA Galaxy 1.
